entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 09:12 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -29.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
